info.title: Payment Options API
info.description: API for generating Hosted Payment Page (HPP) links and processing payments.

post.description: This endpoint allows you to generate a Hosted Payment Page (HPP) link.

requestBody.description: The request payload to generate an HPP link.

return_url.description: A JSON object containing the Return URLs.

webhook_url.description: The webhook URL for asynchronous notifications.

success_url.description: The URL to redirect the user to after a successful payment.

decline_url.description: The URL to redirect the user to after a failed payment.

cancel_url.description: The URL to redirect the user to if the payment is canceled.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction.

merchant_email.description: The email address of the Merchant.

payment_method.description: A JSON object containing Payment Method.

type.description: The payment method type (e.g., 'scheme').

store_payment_method.description: True to generate a token, or False not to generate one.

billing_address.description: A JSON object containing the billing address of the cardholder.

shipping_address.description: A JSON object containing the shipping address of the cardholder.

url.description: The URL Link of the hosted payment page link generated.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction.

currency.description: The processing currency of the transaction.

merchant_id.description: The DAS merchant ID of the transaction performed.

merchant_email.description: The email address of the Merchant.

return_url.description: A JSON object containing the Return URL.

webhook_url.description: The webhook URL for asynchronous notifications.

success_url.description: The URL to redirect the user to after a successful payment.

decline_url.description: The URL to redirect the user to after a failed payment.

cancel_url.description: The URL to redirect the user to if the payment is canceled.

billing_address.description: A JSON object containing the billing address of the cardholder.

shipping_address.description: A JSON object containing the shipping address of the cardholder.

post.description: This endpoint allows merchants to authorize a payment transaction.

requestBody.description: The request payload to authorize a payment transaction.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction.

currency.description: The abbreviation of the processing currency of the product (e.g., JPY).

card.description: A JSON object containing the Card Details.

cvc.description: The Security Code of the card (3 digits for most, 4 digits for AMEX).

expiry_month.description: The expiry month of the card (e.g., 12 for December).

expiry_year.description: The expiry year of the card (e.g., 24 for 2024).

name.description: The cardholder’s name on the card.

payment_method.description: A JSON object containing Payment Method.

type.description: The payment method type (e.g., 'scheme').

store_payment_method.description: True to store the payment method or False not to store (for tokenization).

customer_ip.description: The IP address of the cardholder.

return_url.description: A JSON object containing the Return URL.

success_url.description: The redirect URL after successful payment.

decline_url.description: The redirect URL after failed payment.

billing_address.description: A JSON object containing the billing address of the cardholder.

shipping_address.description: A JSON object containing the shipping address of the cardholder (optional).

time_zone.description: The country time zone of the transaction.

success.description: True on successful transaction, false on failure.

status_code.description: The status code of the transaction.

is_live.description: True if live transaction, false if test transaction.

gateway_response.description: A JSON object containing the response from the gateway.

type.description: Type of response (e.g., INFO).

message.description: The message response from the gateway.

merchant_details.description: A JSON object containing the details of the merchant.

billing_details.description: A JSON object containing the billing details.

billing_address.description: A JSON object containing the billing address.

device_details.description: A JSON object containing the device details.

visited_ip.description: IP address of the payment page.

payment_details.description: A JSON object containing the payment details.

amount.description: The amount value of the transaction.

payment_method.description: The payment card type (e.g., Credit Card).

card.description: A JSON object containing details of the card.

name.description: The cardholder’s name on the card.

exp_month.description: The expiry month of the card.

exp_year.description: The expiry year of the card.

additional_data.description: A JSON object containing additional data.

payment_data_source.description: A JSON object containing the payment data source.

type.description: The type of payment data source.

transaction_details.description: A JSON object containing details of the transaction.

ref.description: The authorization code of the transaction.

timestamp.description: Date and time of the transaction.

stored_payment_method_id.description: The stored payment method ID (if applicable).

risk-details.description: A JSON object containing details of risk.

post.description: This endpoint allows merchants to process a payment transaction.

requestBody.description: The request payload to process a payment transaction.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction.

currency.description: The abbreviation of the processing currency (e.g., JPY).

card.description: A JSON object containing the card details.

cvc.description: The security code of the card (3 digits for most, 4 digits for AMEX).

expiry_month.description: The expiry month of the card (e.g., 12 for December).

expiry_year.description: The expiry year of the card (e.g., 24 for 2024).

name.description: The cardholder’s name on the card.

payment_method.description: A JSON object containing the payment method.

type.description: The payment method type (e.g., 'scheme').

store_payment_method.description: True to store the payment method or False not to store (for tokenization).

customer_ip.description: The IP address of the cardholder.

return_url.description: A JSON object containing the return URLs.

success_url.description: The redirect URL after successful payment.

decline_url.description: The redirect URL after failed payment.

billing_address.description: A JSON object containing the billing address of the cardholder.

shipping_address.description: A JSON object containing the shipping address of the cardholder (optional).

time_zone.description: The country time zone of the transaction.

success.description: True on successful transaction, false on failure.

status_code.description: The status code of the transaction.

is_live.description: True if live transaction, false if test transaction.

type.description: Type of response (e.g., INFO).

message.description: The message response from the gateway.

post.description: This endpoint allows merchants to capture an authorized transaction amount.

requestBody.description: The request payload to capture a transaction.

transactionId.description: The original transaction ID of the authorized transaction.

amount.description: The amount to be captured. This should not exceed the amount authorized. Amount limit depends on the bank.

notes.description: The reference of the capture transaction (optional).

success.description: True on successful transaction, false on failure.

status_code.description: The status code of the transaction.

is_live.description: True if live transaction, false if test transaction.

post.description: This endpoint allows merchants to refund a captured or purchased transaction amount.

requestBody.description: The request payload to refund a transaction.

transactionId.description: The original transaction ID of the authorized transaction.

amount.description: The amount to be refunded. This should not exceed the amount captured or purchased. Amount limit depends on the bank.

notes.description: The reference of the refund transaction (optional).

success.description: True on successful transaction, false on failure.

status_code.description: The status code of the transaction.

is_live.description: True if live transaction, false if test transaction.

get.description: This endpoint allows merchants to retrieve the status of a specific transaction using its transaction ID.

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The original transaction ID of the Pre-Auth, Capture, Refund, or Void transaction.

success.description: True on successful transaction, false on failure.

status_code.description: The status code of the transaction.

is_live.description: True if live transaction, false if test transaction.

type.description: Type of response, INFO for informative.

post.description: Processes subscription payments using card and subscription details.

amount.description: The transaction amount.

currency.description: ISO currency code for the transaction (e.g., JPY).

card.description: Details of the card used for the payment.

type.description: Payment method type (e.g., 'scheme' for card payments).

store_payment_method.description: Whether to store the payment method for future transactions.

customer_ip.description: IP address of the customer initiating the transaction.

return_url.description: URLs for handling different transaction outcomes.

success_url.description: URL to redirect the user after a successful transaction.

decline_url.description: URL to redirect the user after a declined transaction.

billing_address.description: Details of the cardholder's billing address.

shipping_address.description: Details of the cardholder's shipping address.

subscription.description: Details of the subscription being processed.

cycle_type.description: Type of subscription cycle (e.g., DAYS, MONTHS).

has_trial_period.description: Indicates if the subscription includes a trial period.

trial_period_duration_type.description: Type of trial period duration (e.g., DAYS, MONTHS).

has_discount.description: Indicates if the subscription includes a discount.

discount_percentage.description: Discount percentage applied to the subscription.

discount_duration.description: Duration of the discount in billing cycles.

success.description: Indicates whether the transaction was successful.

status_code.description: HTTP status code of the transaction.

is_live.description: Indicates whether the transaction was live or a test.

type.description: Type of the gateway response.

billing_details.description: Details of the billing and shipping addresses.

visited_ip.description: IP address of the payment page visited.

amount.description: Amount of the transaction.

type.description: Type of payment data source.
Type of subscription (e.g., CYCLE).

billing_cycle_type.description: Type of billing cycle (e.g., DAYS, MONTHS).

amount.description: Amount for each billing cycle.

trial_period_duration_type.description: Type of the trial period duration.

plan_discount_percentage.description: Discount percentage applied to the subscription plan.

plan_discount_duration.description: Duration of the discount in billing cycles.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of subscriptions and their details.

200.description: A successful response containing subscription details.

success.description: Indicates whether the transaction was successful.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

is_live.description: Indicates if the transaction is live or a test transaction.

type.description: The type of subscription (e.g., CYCLE or Unlimited).

max_cycle_count.description: The maximum number of billing cycles.

completed_payment_cycle.description: The number of completed payment cycles.

next_payment_date.description: The next payment date of the subscription.

name.description: The name of the subscription plan.

desc.description: The description of the subscription plan.

billing_cycle_type.description: The type of billing cycle (e.g., DAYS or MONTHS).

amount.description: The payment amount for the subscription plan.

ccy.description: The currency of the subscription transaction.

trial_period_duration.description: The duration of the trial period (if applicable).

trial_period_duration_type.description: The type of trial period duration (e.g., DAYS or MONTHS).

plan_discount_percentage.description: The discount percentage for the subscription plan.

plan_discount_duration.description: The duration of the discount in billing cycles.

subscription_transaction_details.description: A list of transaction details for the subscription.

id.description: The Transaction ID of this subscription transaction.

ref.description: The reference of the subscription transaction.

cycle.description: The payment cycle number of the transaction.

status.description: The status of the subscription transaction.

transaction_date.description: The date of the subscription transaction.

amount.description: The payment amount of the transaction.

event.description: The event type for the transaction (e.g., CAPTURED).

get.description: This endpoint retrieves detailed information about a specific subscription using its Subscription ID.

parameters.name: subscription_id

schema.description: The unique Subscription ID of the subscription.

parameters.description: The Subscription ID of the subscription. Example: 664dc930-88bd-4696-8807-5e0f1fedba0b.

200.description: A successful response containing the subscription details.

success.description: Indicates whether the transaction was successful.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

is_live.description: Indicates if the transaction is live or a test transaction.

type.description: The type of subscription (e.g., CYCLE or Unlimited).

max_cycle_count.description: The maximum number of billing cycles.

completed_payment_cycle.description: The number of completed payment cycles.

last_payment_status.description: The status of the last payment made under this subscription.

next_payment_date.description: The next payment date of the subscription.

name.description: The name of the subscription plan.

desc.description: The description of the subscription plan.

billing_cycle_type.description: The type of billing cycle (e.g., DAYS or MONTHS).

amount.description: The payment amount for the subscription plan.

ccy.description: The currency of the subscription transaction.

trial_period_duration.description: The duration of the trial period (if applicable).

trial_period_duration_type.description: The type of trial period duration (e.g., DAYS or MONTHS).

plan_discount_percentage.description: The discount percentage for the subscription plan.

plan_discount_duration.description: The duration of the discount in billing cycles.

subscription_transaction_details.description: A list of transaction details for the subscription.

id.description: The Transaction ID of this subscription transaction.

ref.description: The reference of the subscription transaction.

cycle.description: The payment cycle number of the transaction.

status.description: The status of the subscription transaction.

transaction_date.description: The date of the subscription transaction.

amount.description: The payment amount of the transaction.

event.description: The event type for the transaction (e.g., CAPTURED).

post.description: This endpoint pauses a subscription using its Subscription ID.

parameters.name: subscription_id

schema.description: The unique Subscription ID of the subscription.

parameters.description: The Subscription ID of the subscription. Example: 664dc930-88bd-4696-8807-5e0f1fedba0b.

200.description: A successful response indicating the subscription has been paused.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

is_live.description: Indicates if the transaction is live or a test transaction.

type.description: Type of response (e.g., INFO for informative response).
The type of subscription (e.g., CYCLE or Unlimited).

max_cycle_count.description: The maximum number of billing cycles.

status.description: The updated status of the subscription.

completed_payment_cycle.description: The number of completed payment cycles.

last_payment_status.description: The status of the last payment made under this subscription.

next_payment_date.description: The next payment date of the subscription.

name.description: The name of the subscription plan.

desc.description: The description of the subscription plan.

billing_cycle_type.description: The type of billing cycle (e.g., DAYS or MONTHS).

amount.description: The payment amount for the subscription plan.

ccy.description: The currency of the subscription transaction.

trial_period_duration.description: The duration of the trial period (if applicable).

trial_period_duration_type.description: The type of trial period duration (e.g., DAYS or MONTHS).

plan_discount_percentage.description: The discount percentage for the subscription plan.

plan_discount_duration.description: The duration of the discount in billing cycles.

subscription_transaction_details.description: A list of transaction details for the subscription.

id.description: The Transaction ID of this subscription transaction.

ref.description: The reference of the subscription transaction.

cycle.description: The payment cycle number of the transaction.

status.description: The status of the subscription transaction.

transaction_date.description: The date of the subscription transaction.

amount.description: The payment amount of the transaction.

event.description: The event type for the transaction (e.g., CAPTURED).

post.description: This endpoint resumes a paused subscription using its Subscription ID.

parameters.name: subscription_id

schema.description: The unique Subscription ID of the subscription.

parameters.description: The Subscription ID of the subscription. Example: 664dc930-88bd-4696-8807-5e0f1fedba0b.

200.description: A successful response indicating the subscription has been resumed.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

is_live.description: Indicates if the transaction is live or a test transaction.

type.description: Type of response (e.g., INFO for informative response).

post.description: This endpoint cancels an active subscription using its Subscription ID.

parameters.name: subscription_id

schema.description: The unique Subscription ID of the subscription.

type.description: Type of response (e.g., INFO for informative response).

apiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
apiKeyAuth.description: API Key for Authorization. Format: 'Basic YOUR_API_KEY_HERE'
